extendedInfo.description: Squish the butterflies as they fly around and see a burst of pink dots on the screen.   Includes a score counter to keep track of squished butterflies.  The kitten will also meow and purr when you touch it.  Parents there are no ads during game play so toddlers are safe from accidentally clicking on unknown ads.  Support us by checking out our other products (click More Apps) when the game first start up.

reviews.comment: Keeps my 2 yr old busy for a moment..would be better if there were more bright colors
reviews.author: A Google User
